name: Space Jam
review: Space Jam is a cosmic collision of nostalgia and hoops, a slam dunk that sends your heart soaring through the stars.

name: Dune Part 1
review: Dune Part 1 is a cinematic odyssey that plunges you into a mesmerizing world of epic proportions. Denis Villeneuve's vision is nothing short of awe-inspiring, a masterclass in storytelling

name: Dune Part 2
review: Alright, buckle up, because Dune Part 2 is one wild ride! This movie takes everything you loved about the first one and cranks it up to eleven!
